tags.name: Goal

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: filter query by goals that were created after startDate value

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: filter query by goals that were created within the week of date value

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: filter query by goals that were created before endDate value

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve (1-based index)
